Package MainGameLogic

Class RandomEvents

java.lang.Object
MainGameLogic.RandomEvents
public class RandomEvents
extends java.lang.Object
This class implements RandomEvents. This allows for events that can occur to be determined and then for their outcome to be determined. These events can occur during sailing. There is a 50% chance that an event will occur and the type of event is based on the players chosen routes risk.
Version:
1.1, 16 April 2021.
Author:
John Elliott

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    RandomEvents​(int diffculty)
    Initialized a event and determines if an event has actually occurred or not, this is a 50% chance.

  • Constructor Details

    • RandomEvents

      public RandomEvents​(int diffculty)
      Initialized a event and determines if an event has actually occurred or not, this is a 50% chance.
      Parameters:
      diffculty - A value used to determine the likelihood of a pirate event.

  • Method Details

    • getRandomNumber

      public static int getRandomNumber​(int bound)
      A static method used to find a random integer value within a bound, 0 - bound.
      Parameters:
      bound - The upper bound of the random number.
      Returns:
      number The random number generated.

    • eventWeather

      public int eventWeather()
      The method used to determine the level of damage to the ship during a weather event.
      Returns:
      damage The level of damage to the ship.

    • eventSailors

      public int eventSailors()
      The method used to determine the amount of money received from saving sailors during a sailor event.
      Returns:
      wealth The amount of money received.

    • rollDice

      public void rollDice()
      This method allows the player to roll the dice and keeps track of the current games won. This method resets the value of the winner if the opponent wins.

    • eventPirates

      public void eventPirates​(Upgrade cannons)
      The method used to setup the pirate event they player need to win to escape.
      Parameters:
      cannons - The cannon upgrade on the ship.

    • getType

      public java.lang.String getType()
      A get method for the type of event this is.
      Returns:
      type The type of event.

    • getOutCome

      public java.lang.String getOutCome()
      A get method for the outcome of the event.
      Returns:
      outcome The event outcome.

    • setOutcome

      public void setOutcome​(java.lang.String newOutcome)
      A set method used to update the outcome of the event.
      Parameters:
      newOutcome - The new outcome of the event.

    • getWon

      public int getWon()
      A get method for the current winnings of the pirate game.
      Returns:
      won The current winnings of the pirate game.
